https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/fbc2VQB9cHUioEoBF6FoqYvOeOK.jpg Kim Chang-ok, a top communications expert in South Korea, resonated and brought comfort to a lot of people. A road movie showing the journey of healing and reconciliation with his hearing-impaired father, and the search to find the 'Real Kim Chang-ok'. Can You Hear Me?
